plant_care_info.watering: Pothos require moderate watering, about once a week. Allow the top inch of soil to dry out before watering.

plant_care_info.propagation: Pothos are easy to propagate from stem cuttings. Cut a stem just below a leaf node, remove the bottom leaves, and place the cutting in a glass of water.
